mapper.sql: s.id as id, s.name as name, s.code as code, s.type as type, s.value as value, s.parent_id as parentId, s.create_id as createId, s.create_time as createTime, s.update_id as updateId, s.update_time as updateTime, s.usable as usable
mapper.select:
select , d.name as parentName, from tb_system_data_type s left join tb_system_data_type d on d.id = s.parent_id where s.usable = 1
and s.type = #{type}
and s.name like concat('%', #{searchPhrase}, '%')
order by s.update_time desc
